workflow-alignment-stats-report.title: Report of the alignment statistics

workflow-snv-report.title: Report of the SNP workflow
workflow-snv-report.description: Report summarising the results of the SNP subworkflow for the sample.

workflow-sv-report.title: Report of the SV workflow
workflow-sv-report.description: Report summarising the results of the SV subworkflow for the sample.

workflow-cnv-report.title: Report of the CNV workflow
workflow-cnv-report.description: Report summarising the results of the CNV subworkflow for the sample.

workflow-str-report.title: Report of the STR workflow
workflow-str-report.description: Report summarising the results of the short tandem repeat subworkflow for the sample.

snp-vcf.title: Short variant VCF
snp-vcf.description: VCF file with the SNPs for the sample.

sv-vcf.title: Structural variant VCF
sv-vcf.description: VCF file with the SVs for the sample.

phased-vcf.title: SNP and SV phased VCF
phased-vcf.description: VCF file with the jointly phased SNPs and SVs for the sample.

cnv-vcf.title: Copy number variants VCF
cnv-vcf.description: VCF file with the CNV for the sample.

mod-bedmethyl.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl
mod-bedmethyl.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts for the sample.

mod-bedmethyl-hap1.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl (haplotype 1)
mod-bedmethyl-hap1.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts for haplotype 1 of the sample.

mod-bedmethyl-hap2.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl (haplotype 2)
mod-bedmethyl-hap2.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts for haplotype 2 of the sample.

mod-bedmethyl-ungroup.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl (ungrouped)
mod-bedmethyl-ungroup.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts of non-haplotagged reads for the sample.

str-vcf.title: Short tandem repeat VCF
str-vcf.description: VCF file with the STR sites for the sample.

alignment.title: Alignment file
alignment.description: CRAM or BAM file with the aligned reads for the sample, generated when the input file is unaligned.

alignment-index.title: Alignment file index
alignment-index.description: The index of the resulting CRAM or BAM file with the reads for the sample, generated when the input file is unaligned.

haplotagged-alignment.title: Haplotagged alignment file
haplotagged-alignment.description: CRAM or BAM file with the haplotagged reads for the sample.

haplotagged-alignment-index.title: Haplotagged alignment file index
haplotagged-alignment-index.description: The index of the resulting CRAM or BAM file with the haplotagged reads for the sample.

coverage-by-region.title: Mean coverage for each region
coverage-by-region.description: The mean coverage in the individual regions of the genome in BED format.

coverage-by-threshold.title: Coverage per region above the given thresholds
coverage-by-threshold.description: The BED reporting the number of bases in each region that are covered at or above each threshold values (1x, 10x, 20x and 30x).

distribution-of-coverage.title: Distribution of the proportion of total bases covered by a given coverage value
distribution-of-coverage.description: The cumulative distribution indicating the proportion of total bases covered by a given coverage value, both genome-wide and by sequence.

coverage-summary.title: Mean coverage per sequence and target region
coverage-summary.description: The summary of mean depths per chromosome and within specified regions per chromosome.

coverage-per-base.title: BEDgraph of the single-base coverage
coverage-per-base.description: The single-base coverage of the genome in BED graph format.
